name: Arbitrage Strategies Manifest
description: Registry of all implemented trading strategies with metadata.

strategies.name: Currency Carry Trade
strategies.description: Exploits interest rate differentials between currencies.

strategies.name: Interest Rate Arbitrage
strategies.description: Takes positions across bond futures to capture mispricing in interest rate curves.

strategies.name: Statistical Arbitrage
strategies.description: Uses historical mean-reversion and correlation breakdowns to find pricing inefficiencies.

strategies.name: Trend Following
strategies.description: Captures momentum by trading in the direction of established market trends.

strategies.name: Carry Strategy
strategies.description: Earns returns by holding higher-yielding assets funded by lower-yielding ones.

strategies.name: Merger Arbitrage
strategies.description: Profits from price discrepancies before and after corporate merger events.
